mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.EMP_NAME FROM PS_ATTENDANCE A JOIN EMPLOYEE B ON A.PSA_EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO WHERE A.PSA_EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND A.PSA_CREATEDATE LIKE SYSDATE
